title: Dirty Secrets of the World's Worst Employee
description: Every company has dirty secrets. Businesses are run by people and people are not perfect. Of the course of my crooked career, I’ve witnessed corporate corruption, inter-office affairs, sexual harassment, theft, bullying, and manipulation, and that’s just in a small city in Canada. Imagine how many unethical decisions and scandalous secrets are hiding in the office building where you live.
author: Jenn Sadai
